summary: Completed iteration 5 comprehensive testing. Backend APIs excellent (95.2% success rate). Admin login working, mobile responsive (no horizontal scroll at 375px/768px). Course listing functional (8 courses). Student pages partially working with some navigation issues. Core functionality solid with minor UI improvements needed.

minor.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful ticket creation
minor.impact: Minor - ticket is created successfully, just wrong HTTP status code
